trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Perhaps irreplaceable rings should not be taken on fishing trips.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_TODO_00<tab>Using the dawn ring, search for the dusk ring.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the dusk ring.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the dawn and dusk rings to the impetuous youth.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_000<tab>Sorry to trouble you, but how good are you at diving?
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_001<tab>What!? You can <var 1A 02 /var>breathe<var 1A 01 /var> underwater!? In that case, you're everything I'd hoped for! Better, in fact!

TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_002<tab>All right, here's the embarrassing part. While I was fishing, I somehow managed to drop an irreplaceable ring into the lake. I scrambled to catch it before it sank, but I was too late.

TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_003<tab>I tried diving in to search for it, only to find the lake is far too deep. I can't hold my breath long enough to reach the bottom, never mind find a ring while I'm down there. Please, help me get back my precious dusk ring!
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_005<tab>It's actually paired with another, this dawn ring. An enchantment changes their stones blue when close, and red when, ah, close-ish.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_006<tab>In other words, you can use the stone's color to find my lost dusk ring. It'd mean the world to me if you could bring it back!
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_010<tab>Oh, and be careful not to lose the dawn ring in the lake! Finding one ring is hard enough, never mind two...
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>The dawn ring does not respond. The dusk ring must be in another location entirely.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The dawn ring glows red. You must be somewhat near to the dusk ring.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The dawn ring glows a faint blue. You must be near to the dusk ring.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The dawn ring glows a vibrant blue! Try searching this location for the dusk ring.
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_030<tab>You found it!? I can't believe it! Before I go getting all giddy with excitement, could I have both rings, please?
TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_031<tab>This is it! My dusk ring! I don't know how to thank you. Now, I can finally propose to my beloved!

TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_032<tab>The tale passed down in my family tells of a man─one of our ancestors─who crafted the dawn and dusk rings to express his heart's desire to his true love.

TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_033<tab>The magical bond that exists between the two rings joins them as a pair, much like dawn and dusk themselves. Ever since, these rings have become the traditional gifts given in our marriage proposals.

TEXT_KINGZE018_05136_HEISATALOSS05136_000_036<tab>And now, my time has finally arrived! I'll never forget what you've done for me. I'll be sure to tell my future children all about it, and my children's children!
